snippet: The latest occurrence follows a series of scandals and mishaps for the agency, including an embarrassing history with drinking episodes.
abstract: Dept of Homeland Security is investigating allegations that senior Secret Service agents Mark Connolly and George Ogilvie crashed a government-issued car into White House barricade after night of drinking; episode is latest in series of scandals and misadventures that have befallen the agency.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

lead_paragraph: The latest occurrence follows a series of scandals and mishaps for the agency, including an embarrassing history with drinking episodes.

headline.main: Secret Service Inquiry Follows Agents’ Crash at White House
headline.print_headline: Secret Service Inquiry Follows Agents’ Crash at White House

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Homeland Security Office of Inspector General
